splash_content.title: DISCOVER THE BEST FEATURE OF THIS VERSION

articles.title: 🔥 New scenario feature
articles.desc: (Enterprise only) Create scenarios to set up a series of actions to be executed when a subscriber performs a specific action. You could for example automatically resend a confirmation email if the user is not confirmed after a certain time.

articles.title: 🎁 New icons
articles.desc: All icons have been updated to a new design, more modern and consistent with the AcyMailing brand.

articles.title: 🎁 Improved code structure
articles.desc: We updated the code structure to comply with PSR-4 standards. This change improves compatibility and overall maintainability.

articles.title: 🎁 Sendgrid new API
articles.desc: Our integration in AcyMailing now handles the new result sent by Sendgrid when an email is sent through their API.

articles.title: 🧩 Cloudflare captcha
articles.desc: We added the compatibility with the Cloudflare captcha plugin to our captcha option in the configuration.

articles.title: 🧩 More HikaShop dynamic content
articles.desc: It is now possible to add dynamic information through dynamic text/content about an order in a follow-up email based on HikaShop purchase.

articles.title: 🧩 Fixed user creation from front-end
articles.desc: If the option 'Allow non-logged in users' was disabled, it was impossible for admins to create users from the front-end user management menu.

articles.title: 🧩 Outlook images
articles.desc: We fixed the display of images on Outlook for Joomla 4 and 5 websites, when an inserted article contains an image from the Joomla media manager.

articles.title: 🧩 Articles SEF links
articles.desc: When inserting Joomla articles, the menu ID option is now used when generating a SEF link.

articles.title: 🧩 Docman integration fix
articles.desc: We fixed the Docman insertion by category for automatic campaigns when the option to only insert new content is active.

articles.title: 🧩 New integration with Learndash
articles.desc: A new plugin lets you filter AcyMailing users by Learndash groups and courses.

articles.title: 🧩 Easier WooCommerce product insertion
articles.desc: WooCommerce products can now be searched by SKU when inserting them in emails.

articles.title: 🧩 More WooCommerce dynamic content
articles.desc: It is now possible to add dynamic information through dynamic text/content about an order in a follow-up email based on WooCommerce purchase.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: 🛠 User confirmation status
articles.desc: Specific parts like the filter by email confirmation status are not shown anymore on the users listing when the double opt-in is disabled.

articles.title: 🛠 Automatic bounce handling
articles.desc: The bounce handling could generate errors on some servers, preventing the automatic execution of the bounce handling process.

articles.title: 🛠 Queue listing
articles.desc: A warning has been fixed on the queue listing when only follow-up campaigns were queued

articles.title: 🛠 Website emails
articles.desc: The option to send website emails using AcyMailing now correctly handles plain text emails.

articles.title: 🛠 Editor social icons
articles.desc: The image of the social icon is now refreshed immediately when uploading a new icon in the editor.
